name: Departure (itch) (Stagelily Studios)
description:
FREE ALPHA BUILD OF THE FIRST AREA AVAILABLE NOW!

FULL GAME RELEASES IN AUGUST!

     Departure is a tale about a young boy's journey down to the core of the earth and back to stop a tall shadow man from sacrificing his baby sister to it's queen, Momma.

Explore a Beautiful Handcrafted World - Run and Jump through 50+ handcrafted levels with lore and collectibles sprinkled throughout them...man I LOVE sprinkles...

Sick Physics Based Puzzles - Solve physics-based puzzles like pushing boxes to make a jump or swinging on a vine to get through a small gap.

Filled with Lore - Digging deeper and thinking harder is rewarded greatly with hidden lore throughout the game to find if you look in the right places.

CREDITS

Art, Music and Design by Stagelily Studios

Additional sound effects obtained from zapsplat.org
